issue.title: [Documentation] SEO tags confused for some pages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12691](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12691). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I really enjoy the new site layout.  However, I have a habit of searching for "Arrow Columnar Format" when I have questions about the spec and noticed recently that Google's "blurb" for the page was a bit messed up.  I'm not entirely certain this is new but I feel I would have noticed it before.

 

![image-2021-05-07-07-24-07-854.png](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/13025167/image-2021-05-07-07-24-07-854.png)
